name: Samurai Guy
description:
I created this game using JavaScript programming

  • Players move using the arrows on the keyboard
  • Players shoot using WASD keys
  • Players can destroy ice walls
  • Players can cast ice walls by clicking on any area not inhibited by the player, collection item, portal, enemy, or any wall that may let out an enemy unit.

*Might have to hit tab a once or twice before being able to move character*
